fields.text: Thank you for calling WellnessFX in San Francisco, where your wellness is in your hands.
To schedule a new wellness assessment, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our appointment scheduling team.
To reschedule or cancel an existing appointment, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a scheduling specialist.
For test results and wellness consultations, press [INDEX].
To hear your recent test results, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve your results.
To speak with a wellness advisor about your results, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a wellness advisor.
